issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
h1. Feature
On iOS, we have the Titanium.Media.VideoPlayer.thumbnailImageAtTime function which takes a time and an options array, and returns a blob thumbnail. Android doesn't have this function implemented.

So we can either add it to Android, or update the documentation saying it is not available for Android.

h2. Documentation
http://developer.appcelerator.com/apidoc/mobile/latest/Titanium.Media.VideoPlayer.thumbnailImageAtTime-method.html

h2. Associated Helpdesk Ticket
http://appc.me/c/APP-565369

comments.body: Documentation is corrected. But we should support thumbnails on Android.
